Html:
Hello Mark.

 

I have window that display fft of playing audio file.

I need to know when in a specific hz the power pass the power limit.

For example: between 400hz and 600hz the power limit is -10db when the limit passed I want to know that.

How can I get the freq. and the power of each freq. ?

 

Thank you vey much!

I would suggest you ask on StackOverflow about how to interpret the results of an FFT. I usually take the "magnitude" of each complex number and then the log base 10 of that, but I'm not sure that necessarily gives the power in dB.
